extendedInfo.description: Dots and Boxes (sometimes called "Squares") brings the classic paper and pencil game to your mobile device. You can play against up to three computer or human opponents in a variety of game modes. Each player takes turns to draw a line between a dot on the game area, and if you complete a box you score a point and get another go. The player who completes the most boxes in a round wins.This game features:1) Support for up to four computer or human players.2) Advanced computer intelligence with four levels of computer difficulty - from very easy through to hard.3) Several game modes to choose from, including challenge, points and stamina modes.4) Customize each players name, initial and color.5) Varying grid sizes, up to 10x10 squares.6) Option to continue game, so you needn't play through all levels in one go.7) Scoreloop integration with online leaderboard and achievements.8) Ability to undo the last move made in a game.Game modes include:* Challenge mode - move through progressively harder levels against the computer.* Points mode - score different points for each square, adding a new dimension to the classic game.* Stamina mode - select easy, medium or hard and complete as many levels as possible before losing all your "lives".* Classic mode - choose human and/or computer components on the grid of your choice.The game will highlight moves made by the computer, and includes a number of options for customizing game play and sound.I'd be happy to hear any suggestions you may have to improve the game further, please either email me or put them in a comment. This game does include a small banner advert at the top of the game area.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Better than most other versions of this game I\'ve seen. Simple but attractive ui allows up to 4 player, selected colors, several sizes of board, and several play modes. Haven\'t played the computer yet so don\'t know what kind of algorithm.
reviews.author: Sharon Willoughby

reviews.title: It\'s bad!
reviews.comment: Try deny the network access and it goes completely crazy even after close it. It will flash between the s*ity score loop and desktop like a psico thing. Really really bad!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Played only against the computer, won each game on medium level. Hope it is more challenging at higher levels. Good game to just relax with. Would like to be able to save levels and score.
reviews.author: Peggy Dyar

reviews.title: Below than poor

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I remember play this game with my brother. Must made many dot to play

reviews.title: Dots and boxes
reviews.comment: I like the game a lot. I wish I could put my name to play instead of \"player, medium, e1\" etc. Otherwise, it\'s just like the dots game people play on paper. I think the game would be better if the player could enter their name. I also wish you could earn lives when the player wins a level.
reviews.author: Jen Gurd

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Android plays too bad

reviews.title: Fun game, BUT...
reviews.comment: This game cheats! Watch very closely and you will see it take 2 turns at once when it\'s not supposed to.
